dict.acceptation: 汇票；草稿；选派；（尤指房间、烟囱、炉子等供暖系统中的）（小股）气流；
初步画出或（写出）的；（设计、草图、提纲或版本）正在起草中的，草拟的；以草稿形式的；草图的；

sent.orig: These wall have no draft, can we add draft, how much the draft angle is?
sent.trans: 零件的这些壁都没有脱模斜度，请问能否做出脱模斜度，能做的话做多少？

sent.orig: Any ship being assigned and marked a maximum draft shall not load exceeding such draft.
sent.trans: 小船经勘划有最高吃水尺度者，航行时，其载重不得超过该尺度。

sent.orig: The anti animal cruelty legislation is expert advisory draft, not a legislative draft.
sent.trans: 我们的稿子只是专家建议稿，不是立法稿子。

sent.orig: Fruit of the draft after the meal anteprandial draft fruit that?
sent.trans: 饭后吃水果还是饭前吃水果那？

sent.orig: Is fruit of the draft after the meal still anteprandial draft fruit very good?
sent.trans: 饭后吃水果好还是饭前吃水果好？
